text: hi I'm Selena Gomez I have been an
ambassador for UNICEF for over two years
now I've been able to be in the field
with UNICEF and witness firsthand what
they do to save children's lives all
over the world
January 12th marks the one-year
anniversary of the devastating
earthquake in Haiti let's not forget
that on this date 2010 220,000 people
lost their lives and over three hundred
thousand people were injured leaving
over 750,000 children directly affected
by the earthquake
today there are still over a million
people still displaced to make matters
worse a deadly case of Cholera broke out
killing thousands of people in a matter
of weeks
Haiti still really needs our help much
has been done to help Haiti and over the
next couple of weeks I will be
facebooking and tweeting all the things
that UNICEF and its partners have done
up to this point but there's still so
much more to be done as we recognize the
anniversary of this devastating tragedy
I am making a pledge to be the voice of
the children of Haiti by joining Haiti
365 project with UNICEF USA and to the
children of Haiti I pledge to be a
champion for you
you are the future leaders of Haiti and
I stand with you you can be a champion
for the children of Haiti too by
visiting WWE org and remember even a
dollar can make a difference
